name: Donut Land Clicker
description:
Donut Land Clicker - A casual game where you need to conquer the world with your donuts, so that everyone talks about your donuts in every nook and cranny. To build an empire, you have to clicks a donut, and then on the accumulated donuts - build an empire, buy business after business, improvement after improvement.

Implemented in the game:
- More than 20 types of businesses.
- Over 25 Improvements
- Over 100 Quests
- 100 Achievements.
